      • setCellValue

        public static void setCellValue​(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFCell cell,
                                java.lang.Object value)
                         throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                java.lang.SecurityException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        The POI setCellValue methods only accept a limited number of value types. So we translate what we have to what we need.
        Parameters:
        cell - The Excel cell we're going to populate
        value - The data to be put in the cell
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Indicates we have encountered a value type for which we do not have a translator
        java.lang.SecurityException - Java reflection error - this shouldn't happen
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Java reflection error - this shouldn't happen
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - XSSFCell.set value didn't match expectations
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - Java reflection error - this shouldn't happen
